subject: College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
Economic Conditions and Trends
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: With multimillion-dollar buyouts tougher to afford in any conference from the Big East to the American East, it is a good year to have a bad season.
snippet: With multimillion-dollar buyouts tougher to afford in any conference from the Big East to the American East, it is a good year to have a bad season.
